TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBar/StatusBarPanelCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: Represents the collection of panels in a control.

span.span: Represents the collection of panels in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类存储中显示的面板。The class stores the panels displayed in the . 集合中的每个对象是的一个实例类该类定义的显示特征和行为的一个面板中显示。Each object in the collection is an instance of the class which defines the display characteristics and behaviors of a panel displayed in a . 有多种方式可将面板添加到集合。There are a number of ways to add panels to the collection. 方法提供的功能添加到集合的一个面板。The method provides the ability to add a single panel to the collection. 若要将多个面板添加到集合中，你创建的数组对象，并将其分配给方法。To add a number of panels to the collection, you create an array of objects and assign it to the method. 如果你想要在集合中的特定位置插入一个面板，你可以使用方法。If you want to insert a panel at a specific location within the collection, you can use the method. 若要删除面板，你可以使用方法或方法如果你知道面板是位于集合内。To remove panels, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the panel is located within the collection. 方法使你能够从而不是使用集合中移除所有面板方法一次删除一个面板。The method enables you to remove all panels from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single panel at a time. 除了用于添加和删除面板，方法和属性还提供了查找集合中的面板的方法。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing panels, the also provides methods to find panels within the collection. 方法使您能够确定面板是否是集合的成员。The method enables you to determine whether a panel is a member of the collection. 一旦你知道面板位于集合中，你可以使用方法来确定面板在集合中的位置。Once you know that the panel is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where the panel is located within the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 之一命名`panel1`，显示的应用程序状态文本。One of the , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个命名`panel2`、 显示当前日期，并使用属性类来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是一个标准面板，并使用与属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性，以初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在此示例中定义的方法定义并从的构造函数调用。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以添加到面板控件来显示多个类型的信息。You can add panels to a control to display more than one type of information. 此版本的方法创建一个新中指定的文本与`text`参数并将其添加到集合。This version of the method creates a new with the text specified in the `text` parameter and adds it to collection. 在其中面板位于中的顺序表示内显示面板的顺序控件。The order in which panels are located in the represents the order that panels are displayed within the control. 从左到右从集合中第一个面板显示面板。Panels are displayed from left to right starting with the first panel in the collection. 属性控件不会更改在其中面板中显示的顺序。The property of the control does not change the order in which panels are displayed in the . 若要在集合中特定位置处插入一个面板，使用方法。To insert a panel at a specific position in the collection, use the method. 若要将一组面板添加到单个操作中的集合，使用方法。To add a set of panels to the collection in a single operation, use the method.
